head_commit.message:
VPN-2529: Fetch recommended servers (#5724)

* Convert cityConnectionScore() to a ServerCity property
* Add Q_INVOKABLE method to return recommended servers
* Add ServerCountryModel::cities() to fetch a list of cities
* Use average latency when computing connection score.
* Generate server recommendations from geoip and latency data
* Sort cities by distance when gathering latency data
* Trigger server latency measurement upon feature change
* Remove ServerCountryModel::pickRandom()
* Move ServerCity into a QHash for faster lookups
* Eliminate excess copies by removing ServerCountryModel::servers()
* Store country/city in Server model for faster city lookups.
* Fix multihop tests due to initial entry server selection
